name: indeed_search_jobs
description: Search for jobs on Indeed by keywords and location. Returns up to 15 job listings with title, company, location, salary, snippet, and URL.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Job search query (title, company, or keywords, e.g. 'software engineer')

steps.code: const jobs = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.job_seen_beacon, .jobsearch-SerpJobCard, div.cardOutline, .resultContent'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 15); i++) { const card = cards[i]; const titleEl = card.querySelector('h2.jobTitle a, h2.jobTitle span, a.jcs-JobTitle span'); const companyEl = card.querySelector('[data-testid="company-name"], .companyName, .company_location .companyName a, span.css-1h7lukg'); const locationEl = card.querySelector('[data-testid="text-location"], .companyLocation, .company_location .companyLocation'); const salaryEl = card.querySelector('.salary-snippet-container, .salaryOnly, div.metadata.salary-snippet-container .attribute_snippet, [data-testid="attribute_snippet_testid"]'); const snippetEl = card.querySelector('.job-snippet, .underShelfFooter, div.job-snippet ul li'); const linkEl = card.querySelector('h2.jobTitle a, a.jcs-JobTitle'); const dateEl = card.querySelector('.date, span.css-qvloho'); jobs.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : 'Unknown', company: companyEl ? companyEl.textContent.trim() : '', location: locationEl ? locationEl.textContent.trim() : '', salary: salaryEl ? salaryEl.textContent.trim() : 'Not listed', snippet: snippetEl ? snippetEl.textContent.trim().slice(0, 200) : '', date_posted: dateEl ? dateEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? 'https://www.indeed.com' + linkEl.getAttribute('href') : '' }); } return { query: '{{query}}', location: '{{location}}', job_count: jobs.length, jobs: jobs }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract job listings
